item.title: First Meeting
item.description: The first Meeting In our first meeting we defined what a learning community is for us, which model we are using. Besides this we defined our personal goals and the over arching goal. The later is a tower defense game. It is meant to guide us in a direction to give us fuel for our research and prototypes. The method As method we chose the learning community methodology as the basis for our research.
